TEXT.TITLE: CERTIFICATED COTTON STOCKS
TEXT.BODY: Certificated cotton stocks deliverable on the New York Cotton Exchange No 2 cotton futures contract as of March 31 were reported at 36,659 bales, unchanged from the previous day's figure. There were no bales awaiting review and 985 bales awaiting decertification. Reuter
